target: Þróunaraðstoð í viðskiptum verði aukin, einkum í þeim þróunarlöndum sem eru skemmst á veg komin, meðal annars á grundvelli sameiginlegrar tæknilegrar aðstoðar í viðskiptum.
page_content: Samkvæmt upplýsingum frá Utanríkisráðuneytinu var framlag Íslands 6,6 milljónir Bandaríkjadala árið 2015.

en.target: Increase Aid for Trade support for developing countries, in particular least developed countries, including through the Enhanced Integrated Framework for Trade-related Technical Assistance to Least Developed Countries

According to information from the Ministry for Foreign Affairs, Iceland’s contribution
was USD 6.6 million in 2015
